protocol.text: GeneChip intensities were background-corrected, normalized and summarized by RMA method (Irizarry et al., 2003), using the Affy package from Bioconductor. ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA signal

Germination of seeds, Col0 and rRBr, for the different time points started at the same time under the same conditions and were repeated three times. The phenotypic changes were followed in each experiment via Lugol staining. As the changes occur mainly in the stem cell niche we have dissected the root tips carefully under the microscope and collected material between 20-40mg.

Seeds were sterilized in a sealed container with 100 ml bleach supplemented by 3 ml of 37% hydrochloric acid for 2 to 5 h, and then suspended in 0.1% agarose and plated on a growth medium consisting of Murashige and Skoog salts, 1% Suc, 1.2% plant agar, MES, pH 5.8 and 50 μg/ml ampicilin, stratified for 2 d in a 4°C, and grown vertically in long-day conditions (16 h light followed by 8 h of dark).
